resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: [Rust] Activate several IPC integration tests for rust

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

worklogs.comment:
viirya opened a new pull request, #13685:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/13685

   arrow-rs has added decimal256 support recently. We should activate generate_decimal256_case integration test.

github-actions[bot] commented on PR #13685:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/13685#issuecomment-1192077510

   :warning: Ticket **has not been started in JIRA**, please click 'Start Progress'.

viirya commented on PR #13685:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/13685#issuecomment-1192184041

   cc @alamb

alamb commented on PR #13685:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/13685#issuecomment-1199935385

   Hi @viirya

alamb commented on PR #13685:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/13685#issuecomment-1199935840

   I will watch https://github.com/apache/arrow/runs/7585938940?check_suite_focus=true and https://github.com/apache/arrow/runs/7585938943?check_suite_focus=true to make sure they pass

viirya commented on PR #13685:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/13685#issuecomment-1199947797

   Thank you @alamb !

viirya commented on PR #13685:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/13685#issuecomment-1199962817

   Ah, there was a failure:
   
   ```
   Error: InvalidArgumentError("-555221045220379430784912070743352079671 is too small to store in a Decimal256 of precision 39. Min is -99999999999999999999999999999999999999")
   ```
   
   Like Decimal128 case, we also need to disable validation for Decimal256 case for this integration.
   
   Proposed a fix at https://github.com/apache/arrow-rs/pull/2232
   
   cc @alamb

ursabot commented on PR #13685:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/13685#issuecomment-1200057058

fields.description: arrow-rs has added decimal256 support recently. We should activate generate_decimal256_case integration test.
fields.summary: [Rust] Activate generate_decimal256_case arrow integration test for rust

comments.body: The PR was merged, but this ticket is not automatically closed. cc [~alamb]
Thanks [~viirya]  – I only check the Apache Jira updates occasionally. Sorry I didn't see it before now
No problem. Was just wondering if it should be closed automatically. Thanks.
